Key Match Events: Paolo Banchero scored 34 points and grabbed 7 rebounds in his return to the Magic lineup after a 34-game absence.
Giannis Antetokounmpo scored 41 points to lead the Bucks to a 109-106 victory over the Magic.
Post-Match Reflections: Magic coach Jamahl Mosley praised Banchero's performance and work ethic, highlighting his poise and defensive efforts.
Paolo Banchero expressed frustration over his long recovery but felt encouraged by the team's performance during his absence.
Banchero mentioned the team's belief in each other and the importance of different players stepping up in tight games.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Magic lost their first four games without Banchero but went 19-11 during the remainder of his absence.
The Bucks leapfrogged the Magic for the No. 4 spot in the Eastern Conference with the win, sending Orlando to No. 5.
